cause.description:
We need to save FARHAN KHAN NOW !! DONT WAIT !! (or else bollywood will crash)
DONATE ! HELP ! EXPLAIN ! GIVE TOKES !
1. Canada's seal hunt must end immediately
2. Farhan Must be saved immediately !!
3. Global warming is taking a toll on Farhan
4. Farhan has become a MAGNET !!!!
5. Farhan and 'D Bhai' are like best pals !! Dont MESS with him
6. Too many offers from Bollywood!! Difficult Situation
cause.name: SAVE FARHAN KHAN !
